hero.title: Fullstack Developer
experience.solu.description: Custom solution development on VTEX IO
experience.solu.details.fullDescription: I implemented VTEX IO components for a B2B store enhancing checkout and inventory functionality. I integrated external services (ERP and logistics) through optimized data schemas. I collaborated with functional teams in technical review of requirements to expedite deliveries.
experience.solu.details.responsibilities: Development of reusable components in React + TypeScript
Integration of services via GraphQL and VTEX contexts
Clean code, performance optimization, and documentation
experience.solu.details.highlighted.name: Highlighted project
experience.solu.details.highlighted.deta: Prize wheel component with fluid animations and feedback
Integration with point system and reward management
experience.infracommerce.description: Development of custom solutions on VTEX IO
experience.infracommerce.stack: React, TypeScript, REST/GraphQL, VTEX IO, Context API, Node.js, Git
experience.infracommerce.details.fullDes: I develop custom solutions for a B2B store on VTEX IO, applying best practices and collaborating with cross‑functional teams.
experience.infracommerce.details.respons: Build reusable components in React + TypeScript
Integrate services via GraphQL and VTEX contexts
Clean code, performance optimization and documentation
Cross‑functional collaboration with design and product
experience.infracommerce.details.highlig: Module for dynamic promotions with modular, scalable architecture
Lazy loading by flag type, multilingual (i18n) support
Integration with product‑context, search‑page and product‑list
experience.valtech.description: Development of custom solutions on VTEX IO
experience.valtech.details.fullDescripti: Development of tailored solutions, both frontend and backend, integrating services and optimizing business functionality.
experience.valtech.details.responsibilit: Integration with GTM and Google Analytics
Landing page markup with design collaboration
experience.valtech.details.highlighted.d: Specification filters editable from VTEX Admin
Dynamic navigation and intuitive UI for non‑technical users
experience.valtech.stack: React, TypeScript, REST/GraphQL, VTEX IO, Context API, Node.js, Git
experience.coradir.details.fullDescripti: At CORADIR I developed and maintained internal modules of a corporate CMS, delivering solutions tailored to different areas. I implemented new features, optimized database queries and automated internal flows.
experience.coradir.details.responsibilit: Feature development for the internal CMS with PHP and MySQL
Technical support to internal users and administrative areas
Legacy code refactoring to improve scalability
experience.coradir.stack: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MySQL, PHP, Git
experience.workana.details.fullDescripti: During my time at Workana I started my developer journey, focusing on UI markup. I worked on front‑end tasks with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery to bring visual sections of the platform to life.
experience.workana.details.responsibilit: Responsive page markup with HTML and CSS
Interface dynamics with JavaScript and jQuery
Use of Bootstrap for reusable layouts
Collaboration on small visual and usability improvements
experience.workana.stack: Teamwork, Page design, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Git
about.text: I am a developer with 4+ years building digital products for B2B eCommerce and internal solutions. I love building usable interfaces, optimizing performance, and working in collaborative environments. I always look to apply good development practices, keep clean code, and contribute technically across the project lifecycle.
header.name: Luis Bustamante
header.description: Specialized in React, Node.js, TypeScript, GraphQL and VTEX IO. I build scalable, modular and user‑oriented web solutions.
